mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COUNSELOR ( CS_ID, CS_CHARGE, CS_CERTI, CS_APPROVED, LOCATION ) VALUES ( #{csId}, #{csCharge}, #{csCerti}, 'N', #{location} )
mapper.select: SELECT U.NAME AS name, C.CS_CHARGE AS csCharge, C.LOCATION AS location FROM TB_COUNSELOR C JOIN TB_USER U ON C.CS_ID = U.EMAIL WHERE UPPER(TRIM(C.LOCATION)) = UPPER(TRIM(#{location})) AND UPPER(TRIM(C.CS_CHARGE)) = UPPER(TRIM(#{csCharge}))
